devdoc.details: contract that batches ETH and SUSHI staking into Aave xSUSHI (aXSUSHI).

saave(uint256).details: stake SUSHI `amount` into aXSUSHI by batching calls to `sushiBar` and `aave` lending pool.

saaveTo(address,uint256).details: stake SUSHI `amount` into aXSUSHI for benefit of `to` by batching calls to `sushiBar` and `aave` lending pool.

swaave().details: stake ETH `msg.value` into aXSUSHI by batching calls to `sushiSwapRouter`, `sushiBar` and `aave` lending pool.

swaaveTo(address).details: stake ETH `msg.value` into aXSUSHI for benefit of `to` by batching calls to `sushiSwapRouter`, `sushiBar` and `aave` lending pool.

unSaave(uint256).details: unstake aXSUSHI `amount` into SUSHI by batching calls to `aave` lending pool and `sushiBar`.

unSaaveTo(address,uint256).details: unstake aXSUSHI `amount` into SUSHI for benefit of `to` by batching calls to `aave` lending pool and `sushiBar`.

unSwaave(uint256).details: unstake aXSUSHI `amount` into ETH by batching calls to `aave` lending pool, `sushiBar` and `sushiSwapRouter`.

unSwaaveTo(address,uint256).details: unstake aXSUSHI `amount` into ETH for benefit of `to` by batching calls to `aave` lending pool, `sushiBar` and `sushiSwapRouter`.
